# JVM必知必会

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/jvm-bizhi-bihui
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/jvm-bizhi-bihui
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install jvm-bizhi-bihui
jvm-bizhi-bihui <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g jvm-bizhi-bihui
jvm-bizhi-bihui <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
